Site Administrators
In charge of routine site upkeep/content moderation.
Derek Holliday - R Maven
Derek is a 5th year graduate student in American Politics. His methodological interests include machine learning, text-as-data, and survey experiments.
Office hours:
Tues/Thurs 1-3:30PM (in-person Bunche 4337)
Wed 10AM-12PM (Virtual, email for zoom link)
Contact: deholliday at ucla dot edu
Personal website: derekholliday.com

articles.title: UCLA PoliSci Methods Mavens Resources
articles.description: A clearinghouse for R/Stats resources for political science graduate students.
articles.contents:
Welcome to our website! We hope these resources are useful in your methods careers.
Our intention for this site is to create a repository of R/Stats learning resources, which will include:
various web self-study courses
materials created for departmental R camps
tutorials and problems created by TAs in the context of 200B-D
If you have suggestions for additional topics you want covered, please let us know and we would be happy to organize on your behalf.
xkcd1513
